title: My Sister Told Me to Give Up My Fiancé (LN) - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Broken Engagement   Doting Love Interests   Dragons   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Nobles   R-15

description: My sister took away my position as the Crown Prince’s fianceé, in despair, I decided to become a sacrifice for the dragon. But somehow I was rescued by the dragon, and now we live together.>
